title: Rim Brakes Aren’t Dead Thanks To The Wheeltop EDS-TX Wireless Drivetrain: Taipei Cycle Show 2024
content:
Want electronic shifting with cable pull brakes? Wheeltop's system offers drivetrain options for everyone with 7 to 13-speed cassettes.

Read the full article at Rim Brakes Aren’t Dead Thanks To The Wheeltop EDS-TX Wireless Drivetrain: Taipei Cycle Show 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
